document.discussion_title: Kid Crashes into Fence on Bike
document.topic_text: Kid Crashes into Fence on Bike Jukin Media 25 April 2016 This kid was trying to show off his skill on two wheels in front of his friends, but when he lost control of his bike he veered off his intended course and crashed into a fence.
document.post: Kid Crashes into Fence on Bike Jukin Media 25 April 2016 This kid was trying to show off his skill on two wheels in front of his friends, but when he lost control of his bike he veered off his intended course and crashed into a fence.
